TopicTitle: Clockwork Industries' One Stop Rocket Shop [WIP]

Articles.Content:
Here at One Stop Rocket Shop, we take pride in giving our customers great selections of rockets, probes, and anything else that gets blasted into space or is used to blast stuff into space. Our selection may included both modded and stock ships.

 

Boosters

These nice boosters will help you launch whatever payload you want to into Space with minimal troubles!

OLV

Spoiler

The OLV (Orbital Launch Vehicle) is a simple booster intended for hauling satellites into space. It is a great choice early into career mode, as all of the parts on it are unlocked early on and it's very cheap.

While it is a great option for launching capsules, it is highly unrecommended for launching a space station segment into orbit, or any Kerbals going over 300km away from Kerbin. The biggest con with this rocket is that it has no RCS and therefore you can only turn it by using the boosters.

Download Link: http://www26.zippyshare.com/v/M66EXTQB/file.html

 

IPE-LR

Spoiler

To be honest, I actually forgot what IPE-LR stands for, but nonetheless it's a good but pretty typical rocket when dealing with slightly heavier payloads. It's a good option for launching station segments into orbit, although I wouldn't recommend trying to launch anything beyond Kerbin's SOI. Using this to launch things into the orbit of the Mun or Minmus may be a little tricky, since this is primarily intended to be used to launch larger things into low or relatively high orbit over Kerbin.

Download Link: http://www26.zippyshare.com/v/YAPQ8Otd/file.html

These are the two I have right now, I am currently in the process of making more. While both of these are intended to be stock, I made them with a modded career save. If you are unable to use any of the craft files, please let me know. I know both of these boosters are pretty generic launch vehicles, but once I'm done uploading the other boosters I already have, I'll start working on more interesting things.

 

Surface Vehicles

These include cars, rovers, and anything else that goes onto the surface of planets.

Kerbal Express (Mods: USI Kolonization Systems)

Spoiler

This is kind of a joke rover that I made when I was both bored and desperate for science. The Kerbal Express was built in attempt to milk as much science as possible out of the KSC. This version of the Kerbal Express originally had several modded parts on it, but I simplified it by removing most of them. The Kerbal Express still requires wheels that came from USI Kolonization Systems.

Download Link: http://www26.zippyshare.com/v/yZSFV9F9/file.html

 

Edited February 15, 2016 by Clockwork13
